titles.title: Red Listing Monterey Bay Aquarium Act
Red Listing Monterey Bay Aquarium Act
A bill to provide that no Federal funds shall be appropriated, awarded, or granted to the Monterey Bay Aquarium.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Red Listing Monterey Bay Aquarium Act
This bill prohibits federal funds from being appropriated, awarded, or granted to the Monterey Bay Aquarium located in Monterey, California.
